MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA16 and PA18 postcode areas of Greenock, Wemyss Bay and Inverkip. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5.45pm to remove generators and restore mains supply and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:46PM on Sunday 03 January 2021.
